body: CLANCY--Reverend Monsignor Thomas C. Peacefully returned to the Lord on October 28, 2006. Born on March 14, 1920 to William Clancy and Elizabeth (nee Corrigan). Ordained to the Holy Priesthood on April 3, 1945. After many years of faithful service to the Diocese of Brooklyn, he was appointed as Pastor of the parish of St. Bernard in Bergen Beach
title: Paid Notice: Deaths CLANCY, REVEREND MONSIGNOR THOMAS C.

body: Two sixth-grade boys were arrested yesterday after they were caught with a loaded .45-caliber automatic pistol in Roy H. Mann Intermediate School in Bergen Beach, said a Department of Education spokesman, Keith Kalb. Mr. Kalb said that one boy had the gun but that the other boy, who had two bullets, admitted taking the gun to school. Detective
title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Gun Seized In School

body: Linda Rosenthal, a longtime aide to United States Representative Jerrold L. Nadler, was elected yesterday to the Assembly, representing the Upper West Side of Manhattan. The special election, one of three in New York City yesterday, was to determine the successor to Scott Stringer, who was elected Manhattan borough president in November. Ms.
title: Nadler Aide Wins Seat In Assembly

body: Special elections are being held today for Assembly seats in Manhattan and Brooklyn that opened up when the incumbents resigned or were elected to other positions. The most heated race is on the Upper West Side of Manhattan, in the 67th District, where four candidates are competing to fill the seat vacated by Scott Stringer, a Democrat who was
title: Special Elections for the Legislature Today

body: Recent Sale $6.3 million 2657 East 66th Street Mill Basin, Brooklyn Single-family homes, all with boat slips, are planned for this irregular 200-by-208-foot site, once home to the Bergen Beach Yacht Club.
